gst.ui

Class SignalPanel.ZoomActionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • java.awt.AWTEvent
        • java.awt.event.ActionEvent
          • gst.ui.SignalPanel.ZoomActionEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    SignalPanel

    public static class SignalPanel.ZoomActionEvent
extends java.awt.event.ActionEvent
    An ActionEvent that occurs when a SignalView should zoom to a specific time range. The source of this event should be the SignalView.
    Version:
    0.1.0 (09.08.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public SignalPanel.ZoomActionEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                           long when,
                           int modifiers,
                           double targetRange)
        Constructor implementation.
        Parameters:
        source - object that the action originates from
        when - point in time the action occured
        modifiers - modifier keys down during event
        targetRange - time in milliseconds the time axis should have as range
